name: Turmeric Chicken
author: rhianne
summary: Quick, simple, and delicious tender chicken for those nights you aren't in the mood to cook and do much washing up.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
2  boneless chicken thighs, cut into small pieces
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat
Add shiitake mushrooms, onion, and garlic; cook and stir until onions begin to soften, 5 to 7 minutes
Stir in chicken and season with salt and pepper; cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 15 minutes
Stir paprika and turmeric into chicken mixture until evenly coated
Squeeze lemon onto mixture; stir in parsley
Add rice and stir mixture until rice is heated through, 5 to 7 minutes
